view.name: duplicates
view.query: SELECT *, COUNT(*) FROM EntitySlots GROUP BY WorldPos HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

view.name: slotcount_per_biome
view.query: SELECT Biome, SlotType, COUNT(DISTINCT WorldPos) FROM EntitySlots GROUP BY Biome, SlotType ORDER BY Biome

view.name: slotcount_per_cell
view.query: SELECT Batch, Cell, Biome, SlotType, COUNT(DISTINCT WorldPos) FROM EntitySlots GROUP BY Batch, Cell, Biome, SlotType ORDER BY Biome
